Sentence.sentence: The football team, the basketball team—that's our competition for resources, student time, attention, school dollars, parent efforts, school enthusiasm.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We, of course, need to pay attention to youngsters who are filled with discontent and hostility, but we should not allow these extreme cases to distort our view of most young people.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Mr.Wilhelm said the excess of labels made it difficult for businesses and consumers to know which labels they should pay attention to.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They do not attract the media attention the high-risk group does.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Teenagers' mental problems are getting more and more attention.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: By the end of the decade, it's expected to be worth over $50 billion and generate 160 gigawatt-hours,  enough  to  attract  the  attention  of  major  companies  that  might  not  otherwise  be  interested  in  a  decidedly  pedestrian technology.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They may be forced to divide their attention.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The power of such simple psychology in fighting climate change is attracting attention across the political establishment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Pay more attention to the effectiveness of their treatments.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It has aroused public attention to safety issues.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In their evolution, humans have learned to pay attention to the most urgent issues instead of long-term concerns.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: For all the new attention devoted to the 1 percent, a new dataset from the Equality of Opportunity Project at Harvard and Berkeley suggests that, if we care about upward mobility overall, we're vastly exaggerating the dangers of the rich-poor gap.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Evolution has programmed humans to pay most attention to issues that will have an immediate impact.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Education has not paid enough attention to major environmental issues.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Employees who receive unfavorable evaluations must also be given attention.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The urgency of slowing down-to find the time and space to think-is nothing new, of course, and wiser souls have always reminded us that the more attention we pay to the moment, the less time and energy we have to place it in some larger context.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: To be good leaders, managers must pay close attention to their own values, abilities and strengths.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Private colleges and universities generally do better, partly because they offer smaller classes and more personal attention.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: If the United States wants to keep up in the global economic race, it will have to pay systematic attention to graduating minorities, not just enrolling them
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: they give students more attention
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Whether all that attention has translated into sufficient action is another question.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Boys pay more attention to moving objects than girls.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It has attracted worldwide attention.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: For example, Americans today do not pay much attention to the proverb "Haste makes waste", because patience is not important to them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Speak loudly enough to attract attention.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: That, he figured, should get his classmates' attention.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "Snapping a photo directs attention, which heightens the pleasure you get from whatever you're looking at," Dehl says.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题(第二套)阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Although these may not seem like large effects, the impact of early attention problems continued throughout the children's academic careers.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: As fifth-graders, children with early attention problems obtained average reading scores at least 3% lower than their contemporaries' and grades at least 8% lower than those of their peers.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: By fifth grade, children with early attention difficulties had lower grades and reading achievement scores than their peers.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: By the end of the decade, it's expected to be worth over $50 billion and generate 160 gigawatt-hours, enough to attract the attention of major companies that might not otherwise be interested in a decidedly pedestrian technology.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Children with attention problems in early childhood were 40% less likely to graduate from high school, says a new study from Duke University.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: For example, one study found healthy adults assigned to a high-fat diet for five days showed impaired attention, memory, and mood compared with a low-fat diet control group.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Nicholas Carr, author of The Shallows: What the Internet Is Doing to Our Brains, wrote, "The net is designed to be an interruption system, a machine geared to dividing attention."
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I found that this ability to instantly shift my attention was often a good thing, like when passing time on public transportation.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I think this is a very legitimate concern, and I appreciate their drawing our attention to it," David hill, a father of five, says.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The technologies themselves, and their makers, are the easiest suspects to blame for our diminishing attention spans.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Indeed, when the expert pays attention to the mechanics, it is liable to disrupt performance.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Instead of narrowing our focus, like negative emotions do, positive emotions affect our brains in ways that increase our awareness, attention and memory.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Kristi King, a diet specialist at Texas Children's Hospital, finds it's hard to get teenager patients' attention about healthy eating.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Our findings suggest that even more modest attention difficulties can increase the risk of negative academic outcomes.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Smart basketball players or skilled musicians need to pay close attention to the demands of high performance, to the challenges to be overcome.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Some experts even consider lying a developmental milestone, like crawling and walking, because it requires sophisticated planning, attention and the ability to see a situation from someone else5 s perspective to manipulate them.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The children we identified as having attention difficulties were not diagnosed with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (注意力缺乏多动症, ADHD), although some may have had the disorder.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The results highlight the need to develop effective early interventions to help those with attention on track academically and for educators to encourage positive peer relationships, the researchers said.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: They found that early attention skills were the most consistent predictor of academic success, and that likability by peers also had a modest effect on academic performance.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: They have to give so much thought and attention to the low-level mechanics of handling the ball, or fingering the keys or reading the music, that they are unable to give any thought to the thing that matters—the game, or the music, respectively.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: They're open to the tactical possibilities and the musical challenges precisely because they're freed, through skill, from the need to pay attention to the low-level details of how to play.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: This refers to all the attention young people devote to their phones, tablets and laptops.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: While companies like Facebook harvest attention to generate revenue from advertisers, other technologies have no such agenda.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: with this study, researchers examined early academic attention and socio-emotional skills and how each contributed to academic success into young adulthood.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ive……的→伸展出去的→注意的,有礼貌的
intention[n.意图,意向,目的]+al表形容词→adj.有意图的, 故意的
pre前+tent伸展,趋向+ious……的→提前摆出一种姿态→做作的
attentive[adj.注意的;有礼貌的]+ly表副词→adv.注意地, 留意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 注意,注意力;立正;特别照顾;照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸展出去→注意;照料

stems_affixes.value_cn: 广度,宽度,长度;程度,限度
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tent伸展,趋向→伸出去的范围→广度,宽度
intent[adj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图]+ion表名词→n.意图,意向,目的
tent伸展,趋向→伸展开用来遮雨,阳光等→帐篷

means.word_mean: 注意, 专心, 留心

entry.def: If you give someone or something your attention, you look at it, listen to it, or think about it carefully.

example.ex: Later he turned his attention to the desperate state of housing in the province.
example.tran: 其后，他将注意力转向了该省形势严峻的住房问题。

entry.def: Attention is great interest that is shown in someone or something, particularly by the general public.

example.ex: Volume Two, subtitled 'The Lawyers', will also attract considerable attention...
example.tran: 副标题为“律师”的第二册也将获得广泛关注。

example.ex: The conference may help to focus attention on the economy.
example.tran: 此次会议可能有助于将关注焦点放在经济上。

entry.def: If someone or something is getting attention, they are being dealt with or cared for.

example.ex: Each year more than two million household injuries need medical attention.
example.tran: 每年有超过200万起家中受伤事件需要医疗处理。

example.ex: ...a demanding baby who seems to want attention 24 hours a day.
example.tran: 好像一天24小时都要人照看的难缠的宝宝

entry.def: You can refer to someone's efforts to help you, or the interest they show in you, as their attentions, especially if you dislike or disapprove of them.

example.ex: The only way to escape the unwanted attentions of the local men was not to go out...
example.tran: 避免被当地人指指点点的唯一办法就是闭门不出。

example.ex: The meeting was held away from the attentions of the media...
example.tran: 会议的举行避开了媒体的关注。

entry.def: If you bring something to someone's attention or draw their attention to it, you tell them about it or make them notice it.

example.ex: If we don't keep bringing this to the attention of the people, nothing will be done...
example.tran: 如果我们无法让群众一直关注此事，那将一事无成。

example.ex: We conclude by drawing attention to the issues around which the debate should focus.
example.tran: 我们作总结时着重提到了辩论应该关注的一些问题。

entry.def: If someone or something attracts your attention or catches your attention, you suddenly notice them.

example.ex: A faint aroma of coffee attracted his attention...
example.tran: 淡淡的咖啡香味一下子吸引了他。

example.ex: He sat at one of the round tables and tried to attract her attention.
example.tran: 他坐在其中一张圆桌旁边，想引起她的注意。

entry.def: If you pay attention to someone, you watch them, listen to them, or take notice of them. If you pay no attention to someone, you behave as if you are not aware of them or as if they are not important.
entry.tran: 关心/不关心；注意/不注意

example.ex: More than ever before, the food industry is paying attention to young consumers...
example.tran: 食品工业比以往任何时候都更加关注年轻消费者。

example.ex: Other people walk along the beach at night, so I didn't pay any attention at first...
example.tran: 入夜后还有人在沙滩上散步，起先我并没注意到。

entry.def: When people stand to attention or stand at attention, they stand straight with their feet together and their arms at their sides.

example.ex: Soldiers in full combat gear stood at attention...
example.tran: 全副武装的士兵们立正站着。

example.ex: The waiters stood to attention with napkins folded over their arms.
example.tran: 服务员笔直站立着，餐巾折叠着放在他们的手臂上。

means.word_mean: 1. the process whereby a person concentrates on some features of the environment to the (relative) exclusion of others
2. the work of caring for or attending to someone or something;
3. a general interest that leads people to want to know more;

sentences.sentence: "she tried to win his heart with her many attentions"

means.word_mean: 5. the faculty or power of mental concentration;

sentences.sentence: "keeping track of all the details requires your complete attention"

means.word_mean: 6. a motionless erect stance with arms at the sides and feet together; assumed by military personnel during drill or review;

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin attentio(n-), from the verb attendere (see attend)

sentences.cn: 请注意听我讲的话。
sentences.en: Please pay attention (= listen carefully) to what I am saying.

sentences.cn: 别在意他们所说的话。
sentences.en: Don't pay any attention to what they say (= don't think that it is important) .

sentences.cn: 她试图引起服务员的注意。
sentences.en: She tried to attract the waiter's attention .

sentences.cn: 我尽量使人不察觉到我论证中的弱点。
sentences.en: I tried not to draw attention to (= make people notice) the weak points in my argument.

sentences.cn: 报上一篇文章引起了我的注意。
sentences.en: An article in the newspaper caught my attention .

sentences.cn: 我不能一心一意地关注这个方案。
sentences.en: I couldn't give the programme my undivided attention .

sentences.cn: 我已获悉…
sentences.en: (formal)It has come to my attention (= I have been informed) that…

sentences.cn: 他提请（他们）注意许多档案已经遗失这一事实。
sentences.en: (formal)He called (their) attention to the fact that many files were missing.

sentences.cn: 请注意听我讲话好吗？
sentences.en: (formal) Can I have your attention please?

sentences.cn: 有大明星演出的电影总是引起很大的兴趣。
sentences.en: Films with big stars always attract great attention .

sentences.cn: 身为幼女，她一直是大家关注的中心。
sentences.en: As the youngest child, she was always the centre of attention .

sentences.cn: 幼儿的注意力持续时间很短。
sentences.en: Small children have a very short attention span .

sentences.cn: 他把注意力转回到道路上。
sentences.en: He turned his attention back to the road again.

sentences.cn: 报告对细节的关注
sentences.en: the report's attention to detail

sentences.en: The waiters stood to attention with napkins folded over their arms.

sentences.en: Soldiers in full combat gear stood at attention...

sentences.en: Other people walk along the beach at night, so I didn't pay any attention at first...

sentences.en: More than ever before, the food industry is paying attention to young consumers...

sentences.cn: 他坐在其中一张圆桌旁边，想引起她的注意。
sentences.en: He sat at one of the round tables and tried to attract her attention.

sentences.cn: 淡淡的咖啡香味一下子吸引了他。
sentences.en: A faint aroma of coffee attracted his attention...

sentences.cn: 我们作总结时着重提到了辩论应该关注的一些问题。
sentences.en: We conclude by drawing attention to the issues around which the debate should focus.

sentences.cn: 如果我们无法让群众一直关注此事，那将一事无成。
sentences.en: If we don't keep bringing this to the attention of the people, nothing will be done...

sentences.cn: 好像一天24小时都要人照看的难缠的宝宝
sentences.en: ...a demanding baby who seems to want attention 24 hours a day.

sentences.cn: 避免被当地人指指点点的唯一办法就是闭门不出。
sentences.en: The only way to escape the unwanted attentions of the local men was not to go out...

sentences.cn: 会议的举行避开了媒体的关注。
sentences.en: The meeting was held away from the attentions of the media...

sentences.cn: 我专心听你所讲。
sentences.en: You have my undivided attention...

sentences.cn: 其后，他将注意力转向了该省形势严峻的住房问题。
sentences.en: Later he turned his attention to the desperate state of housing in the province.

sentences.cn: 副标题为“律师”的第二册也将获得广泛关注。
sentences.en: Volume Two, subtitled 'The Lawyers', will also attract considerable attention...

sentences.cn: 此次会议可能有助于将关注焦点放在经济上。
sentences.en: The conference may help to focus attention on the economy.

sentences.cn: 每年有超过200万起家中受伤事件需要医疗处理。
sentences.en: Each year more than two million household injuries need medical attention.

sentences.cn: 请注意！请KL412航班的乘客立即到21号门登机。
sentences.en: Attention, please! Passengers for flight KL412 are requested to go to gate 21 immediately.

sentences.cn: 其次，把金钱和注意力投入科学领域而非别的地方，无疑是件好事。
sentences.en: Second, it is surely a good thing that the money and attention come to science rather than go elsewhere.

sentences.cn: 当孩子们紧张不安地企图获得父母的注意时,父母们却在查看电子邮件。
sentences.en: Parents would be looking at their emails while the children would be making excited bids for their attention.

sentences.cn: 在这个实验中,他要求一位母亲用一种常规的方式和她的孩子互动,然后毫无表情并且不给孩子任何视觉上的交流反馈:孩子会在试图吸引母亲注意力的过程中变得越来越痛苦.
sentences.en: In it, a mother is asked to interact with her child in a normal way before putting on a blank expression and not giving them any visual social feedback: The child becomes increasingly distressed as she attention.

sentences.cn: 应对气候变化所使用的如此简单的心理学知识带来了很大的影响，这引起了政府的注意。
sentences.en: The power of such simple psychology in fighting climate change is attracting attention across the political establishment.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: “橄榄球队、篮球队——这些会和我们抢生源，挤占学生时间，分散学生注意力，争夺学校的资金、父母的努力和学校的热情。”
sentences.en: “The football team, the basketball team—that’s our competition for resources, student time, attention, school dollars, parent efforts, school enthusiasm.”
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: Kristi King 是得克萨斯州儿童医院的饮食专家，他发现很难让青少年患者注意饮食健康。
sentences.en: Kristi King, a diet specialist at Texas Children’s?Hospital, finds it’s hard to get teenager patients’ attention about healthy eating.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 消极情绪会限制我们的注意力，而积极情绪则通过加强意识、提高注意力和记忆力的方式影响我们的大脑。
sentences.en: Instead  of  narrowing  our  focus,  like  negative  emotions  do,  positive  emotions  affect our brains in ways that increase our awareness, attention  and  memory
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 体育活动可促进向大脑的血液 (33) 流动，增强记忆力、注意力和创造力，这些对学习是 (34) 至关重要的。
sentences.en: Physical activity can improve blood 33 flow to the brain, fueling memory, attention and creativity, which are 34 essential to learning.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 幻想倾向是指想象和空想的倾向，而专注力是指让头脑专注于某事的倾向——注意力完全投入到感受和经历上。
sentences.en: Fantasy proneness could be considered a tendency to imagine and daydream,whereas absorption is the tendency to allow your mind to become absorbed in an activity – to pay complete attention to the sensations ( 感受) and the experiences.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 不要分散我的注意力.
sentences.en: Don't distract my attention.

sentences.cn: 她喋喋不休, 想分散他的注意力.
sentences.en: She jabbered away, trying to distract his attention.

sentences.cn: 迄今为止, 欧盟的注意力主要放在经济一体化的建设上.
sentences.en: So far, the EU's attention on the economic integration of the main building.

sentences.cn: 斯梯芬恢复了镇静的样子, 注意力一点不分散地点了点头.
sentences.en: Stephen , subsiding into his quiet manner, and never wandering in his attention, gave a nod.

sentences.cn: 他的全部注意力都集中在此事上.
sentences.en: His whole attention was centered on this matter.

sentences.cn: 我读书的注意力分散了.
sentences.en: My attentions are distracted from my study.

sentences.cn: 夜间城市的古怪景象吸引了她的注意力.
sentences.en: The weirdness of the city by night held her attention.

sentences.cn: 他们把注意力集中在主要问题上.
sentences.en: They focused their attention on the main problems.

sentences.cn: 如果上课注意力不集中,你将会遇到很多麻烦.
sentences.en: Not paying attention to the teacher will get you in a lot of trouble.

sentences.cn: 他的注意力被不断的攀谈所转移.
sentences.en: Her attention was deflected by the constant chattering.

sentences.cn: 你必须在他们的思维进入衰退期之前抓住他们的注意力和兴趣.
sentences.en: Moreover, you have to get his attention and interest before that span wanes.

sentences.cn: 地震防备计划往往并不象真正世界压力下集中注意力的其它一些问题.
sentences.en: Often earthquake preparedness plans are not maintained as real world pressures focus attention onto other problems.

sentences.cn: 控制注意力是终极个人力量.
sentences.en: Control of attention is the ultimate individual power.

sentences.cn: 他讲起故事来娓娓动听, 吸引了所有小朋友的注意力.
sentences.en: He is good at telling stories, and can attract the attention of all the children.

sentences.cn: 我们把注意力集中于改善他们的劳动条件.
sentences.en: We directed our attention to improving their working conditions.

sentences.cn: 把注意力集中在你的工作上.
sentences.en: Focus your attention on your work.

sentences.cn: 他怪诞的行为吸引了我们的注意力.
sentences.en: His bizarre behavior attracted our attention.

sentences.cn: 火车开动以后, 这位妇女的注意力转到窗外不停掠过的景物上.
sentences.en: After the train pulled out of the station, the woman turned her attention to the landscape speeding by.

sentences.cn: 邻近的楼梯上传来轻轻的脚步声,勾住了我的注意力.
sentences.en: A light step on an adjoining staircase arrested my attention.

sentences.cn: 这个广告旨在吸引家庭主妇们的注意力.
sentences.en: This advertisement is calculated to attract the attention of housewives.

sentences.cn: 不要影响运动员的注意力, 当好拉拉队.
sentences.en: Do not affect athlete's attention, when good cheering section.

sentences.cn: 这个急症需要立刻照料.
sentences.en: This emergency case demands immediate attention.

sentences.cn: 如果施以更细心的 照料, 这些大白菜还可以长得更好.
sentences.en: Given more attention ( If they had been given more attention ) , the cabbages could have grown better.

sentences.cn: 细心照料使这株花提前一周开放.
sentences.en: Careful attention has set the flower ahead by a week.

sentences.cn: 由于没有精心照料,这株水仙花已经凋萎了.
sentences.en: This narcissus has already withered due to careless attention.

sentences.cn: 每个孤儿都需要获得个别的照料.
sentences.en: Individual attention is given to each orphan.

sentences.cn: 她悉心照料年迈的双亲.
sentences.en: She gave her aging parents much attention.

sentences.cn: 我喜欢跟格利兹在一起, 经常给它特别照料.
sentences.en: I enjoyed spending time with Griz, giving him personal attention on a regular basis.

sentences.cn: 那个需要长期照料的女人由亲戚们照看着。
sentences.en: The woman, who needs constant attention, is cared for by relatives.

sentences.cn: 我们给这七个人同样的关怀和努力, 但哈维 还在那里.
sentences.en: We gave all seven people the same attention and effort. Heavy is still there.

sentences.cn: 学习西方新闻报道中的人文关怀,给予个体更多的关注.
sentences.en: To pay more attentions to the individuals by learning the humanism concerns the western news report.

sentences.cn: 重视校园文化建设, 营造人文关怀氛围.
sentences.en: Attach great importance to the culture development of the campus, and construct the human attention atmosphere.

sentences.cn: 感恩员工的付出, 感谢客户和同仁的支持,感激政府的关怀.
sentences.en: Thanks for employee's dedication, customer and colleagues'support and governmental kind attention!

sentences.cn: 在对他们进行身体治疗的同时, 更应当对他们的心灵多加关怀.
sentences.en: As well as treating their physical wounds, close attention should be paid to their psychological state.

sentences.cn: 他说泰迪在他失去父母的事上需要更多的关怀.
sentences.en: He said he needed the attention on account of his parents dying.

sentences.cn: 因为缺少关怀,它们长得有点歪了.
sentences.en: They may have grown a little awry for want of attention.

sentences.cn: 小时候你父母没有足够的关怀你 吗 ?
sentences.en: Didn't Mommy and Daddy show you enough attention when you a child?

sentences.cn: 你无时无刻都在意我的感觉,需要,而伸出你的关怀.
sentences.en: You are extending a warm attention as me regard always.

sentences.cn: 在那里孩子无时无刻不在父母的关怀下成长.
sentences.en: There, a child grows up under the everpresent attention of his parents.

sentences.cn: 丽莲·珊波接受了他的殷勤和关怀.
sentences.en: Lillian Seple accepted his attention and interest.

sentences.cn: 汤姆很少受到母亲全心的关怀.
sentences.en: Tom seldom got his mother's undivided attention.

sentences.cn: 她尽量避开她过去男朋友多余的殷勤。
sentences.en: She tried to escape the unwanted attentions of her former boyfriend.

sentences.cn: 像卢克这样的男人没必要向不情愿的女人献殷勤.
sentences.en: A man like Luke had no need to force his attentions on disinclined women.

sentences.cn: 有这么一个衣着体面的人向她献殷勤,总是令人惬意的.
sentences.en: There was something satisfactory in the attention of this individual with his good clothes.

sentences.cn: 他的殷勤似乎已经不合时宜.
sentences.en: His attentions seemed out of place.

sentences.cn: 他见唐小姐, 大献殷勤, 她厌烦不甚理他.
sentences.en: When he met Miss T'ang, he showered her with attention. Annoyed, she ignored him.

sentences.cn: 他们向她争献殷勤.
sentences.en: They all vied in paying her attentions.

sentences.cn: 据报纸报道,约翰现在正向一位意大利伯爵夫人献殷勤.
sentences.en: The newspapers report that at the moment John is paying his attentions to an Italian countess.

sentences.cn: 但是,他的种种殷勤仍然构不成她快乐的成分.
sentences.en: But still his attentions made no part of her satisfaction.

sentences.cn: 一想起埃利奥特先生在大献殷勤,就令人痛苦. 他的这番殷勤真是后患无穷.
sentences.en: It was misery to think of Mr. Elliot's attentions. Their evil was incalculable.

sentences.cn: 不过,她家里一发生这件变故,他就去向她献殷勤, 这未免不象话吧.
sentences.en: But there seems indelicacy in directing his attentions towards her, so soon after this event.

sentences.cn: 医生献殷勤但是寡妇不理睬.
sentences.en: The Doctor's attentions were unheeded by the widow.
